entries.source: Chat Edit: 'The keybind works and opening the tool after trying to use it also works now, thank you, but the actual hyprshot command is not being passed for some reason. Do we need a go-between like a helper script?'
Chat Edit: 'The workspace and selection options work perfectly now, but the window option is not. We're getting there!'

Chat Edit: 'It still does not appear to work, but it does show this in the log:

DEBUG qml: Taking screenshot - mode: window delay: 0 save: true copy: true

Here is the github: https://github.com/s-adi-dev/hyprshot-gui

I also noticed that switching between workspaces now does not change what I see. Wehn switching between the workspaces, the VSCodium window is always on top. Maybe something got messed up in the hyprland.conf window rules or I accidentally used a keybind to make the window always on top?'
